title: Event Header Schema
description: Common event header/metadata structure for all events in the event-based processing system

uuid.description: Unique identifier for the event (UUID format)

eventName.description: Readable event description (e.g., 'Car Created', 'Loan Created', 'Loan Payment Submitted', 'Car Service Done')

createdDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event was created

savedDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event was saved

eventType.description: Readable event description (deprecated: use eventName instead)
